name: Fruity Twist: Fruitful Skills Match Flip Game
name_original: Fruity Twist: Fruitful Skills Match Flip Game
description:
How long can you last? Tap left to rotate the left fruit. Tap right to rotate the right fruit.

Two fruits are coming at you from the top of the screen. Match the fruits' colors on the fruit below. Think fast! Your brain can only process one thought at a time.

Music by Kevin MacLeod. Sound by http://www.freesfx.co.uk.
